name: Alien Parasites & REM Fatigue
effect:
ALIEN PARASITES: Unless INTEGRITY>32, Away Team
(if any) beams back and opponent immediately controls
ship and crew until "stopped."

REM FATIGUE HALLUCINATIONS: Crew or Away
Team dies at end of your third full turn unless
cured by 3 MEDICAL OR docking at outpost. [5 Pts]

name: Anaphasic Organism & Nagilum
effect:
ANAPHASIC ORGANISM: Unless SECURITY and MEDICAL
present, female crew or Away Team member with highest
total attributes resigns (is discarded). (Not repeatable.)

NAGILUM: Half of crew or Away Team is killed
(random selection, round down) unless 3 Diplomacy
OR STRENGTH>40 present. Discard dilemma.

name: Ancient Computer & Microvirus
effect:
ANCIENT COMPUTER: To get past requires 2 Computer Skill
OR 3 SCIENCE OR 3 ENGINEER

MICROVIRUS: Unless MEDICAL and SECURITY present, kills
one crew or Away Team member (opponent's choice)
Discard dilemma.

name: Beverly and Will
effect: CIVILIAN | CIVILIAN
Dual Personnel

When Data was lost with amnesia on Barkon IV, his
human shipmates Beverly Crusher and William T.
Riker disguised themselves as Barkonians to find him.

Beverly: • MEDICAL x2 • Biology ▼ Any Tricorder
Will: • Navigation • Diplomacy • Anthropology
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 7+7 CUNNING 7+8 STRENGTH 4+7

name: Computer Weapon & Hyper-Aging
effect:
ICONIAN COMPUTER WEAPON: Unless SCIENCE present, re-
boot by discarding all non-Personnel cards in hand and
replenishing from top of draw deck. (Not repeatable.)

HYPER-AGING: Mission continues, but entire crew or Away
Team is quarantined and dies at end of your third full
turn unless SCIENCE and 2 MEDICAL present by that time.

name: Covert Installation II
effect:
Neutral Zone Region • Devora: Build station.

ENGINEER + Leadership + Treachery

WORMHOLE: You may move your staffed ship between here
and any other location if that location is a [WH] OR by playing
one Wormhole interrupt there. Then flip this mission over.

name: Data and Geordi
effect: OFFICER | ENGINEER
Dual Personnel

When the Soong-type android Data began feeling
emotions secretly generated by Lore, Geordi La
Forge performed a series of diagnostics on him.

Data: • ENGINEER • Music • Computer Skill
Geordi: • ENGINEER • Physics ▼ Tricorder
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6+8 CUNNING 10+8 STRENGTH 12+6

name: Data and Picard
effect: CIVILIAN | CIVILIAN
Dual Personnel — Dual Affiliation personnel

To search for Spock on Romulus, the Soong-type
android Data and his human captain, Jean-Luc
Picard, disguised themselves as Romulan citizens.

Data: • ENGINEER • Astrophysics • Computer Skill
Picard: • Diplomacy • Anthropology • Archaeology
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 8+8 CUNNING 12+8 STRENGTH 12+6

name: Excavation II
effect:
Kurl: Assist new archaeological dig.

Archaeology OR CUNNING>32

WORMHOLE: You may move your staffed ship between here
and any other location if that location is a [WH] OR by playing
one Wormhole interrupt there. Then flip this mission over.

name: Explore Black Cluster II
effect:
Sector 97: Study and evaluate collapsed proto-stars.

Stellar Cartography + Leadership
OR CUNNING>50

[Kli] Outpost
If destroyed, flip mission over.

name: Explore Typhon Expanse II
effect:
Typhon Expanse: Trace reported time distortion.

Astrophysics + Stellar Cartography
OR CUNNING>50

[Rom] Outpost
If destroyed, flip mission over.

name: Female's Love Interest & Garbage Scow
effect:
FEMALE'S LOVE INTEREST: Female crew or Away Team
member (random selection) runs off with lover
to furthest planet.

RADIOACTIVE GARBAGE SCOW: Place on spaceline here.
Mission cannot be attempted where present. Ship with
Tractor Beam and 2 ENGINEER can tow Scow.

name: Investigate Anomaly II
effect:
Gamma Arigulon II: Trace radiation anomalies.

Exobiology + STRENGTH>35

[Fed] Outpost
If destroyed, flip mission over.

name: Investigate Sighting II
effect:
Beta Stromgren: Investigate sighting of Gomtuu.

Empathy x3
OR Treachery + Exobiology + CUNNING>40

[Rom] Outpost
If destroyed, flip mission over.

name: Jean-Luc and Beverly
effect: OFFICER | MEDICAL
Dual Personnel

Escaping from their captors on Kesprytt III, Jean-Luc
Picard and Beverly Crusher discovered they had
been telepathically linked by psi-wave implants.

Jean-Luc: • Diplomacy • Archaeology • Honor
Beverly: • MEDICAL • Exobiology ▼ Hypospray
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 7+6 CUNNING 8+8 STRENGTH 5+4

name: Male's Love Interest & Plague Ship
effect:
MALE'S LOVE INTEREST: Male crew or Away Team member
(random selection) runs off with lover to furthest planet.

TARELLIAN PLAGUE SHIP: Entire crew or Away
Team immediately dies unless MEDICAL
beams over (discarded). Discard dilemma. [5 Pts]

name: Relief Mission II
effect:
Penthara IV: Alleviate Ice Age conditions.

Geology OR Physics

WORMHOLE: You may move your staffed ship between here
and any other location if that location is a [WH] OR by playing
one Wormhole interrupt there. Then flip this mission over.

name: Secret Salvage II
effect:
Wolf 359: Retrieve wreckage at Borg massacre site.

Treachery x4
OR Navigation x2 + Computer Skill

[Kli] Outpost
If destroyed, flip mission over.

name: Sons of Mogh
effect: OFFICER | SECURITY
Dual Personnel

Klingon brothers. Kurn and Worf fought together
during the Klingon Civil War of 2367-68 to help
Gowron restore stability and honor to the Empire.

Kurn: • Honor • Computer Skill • Navigation
Worf: • Honor x2 • Navigation • Diplomacy
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 8+8 CUNNING 6+6 STRENGTH 8+10

name: Test Mission II
effect:
Praxillus System: Aid helium ignition project.

Physics + INTEGRITY>28

[Fed] Outpost
If destroyed, flip mission over.

name: The Trois
effect: V.I.P. | CIVILIAN
Dual Personnel — Dual Affiliation personnel

Tog abducted Lwaxana Troi and her half-human
daughter Deanna Troi. After beaming the pair out of
their clothes, he planned to exploit their Betazoid skills.

Lwaxana: • Empathy x2 • Diplomacy ▼ Wolf
Deanna: • Diplomacy • Empathy ▼ Plexing
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6+7 CUNNING 7+6 STRENGTH3+4
